TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SqlCacheDependency extends System.Web.Caching.CacheDependency
Public NotInheritable Class SqlCacheDependency Inherits CacheDependency
public ref class SqlCacheDependency sealed : System::Web::Caching::CacheDependency

summary.span: 在存储于 ASP.NET 应用程序的 对象中的项与特定 SQL Server 数据库表或 SQL Server 2005 的查询结果之间建立关系。

span.span: Establishes a relationship between an item stored in an ASP.NET application's object and either a specific SQL Server database table or the results of a SQL Server 2005 query.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在所有受支持版本的 SQL Server (Microsoft SQL Server 7.0、Microsoft SQL Server 2000 和 SQL Server 2005) 该类监视特定的 SQL Server 数据库表。On all supported versions of SQL Server (Microsoft SQL Server 7.0, Microsoft SQL Server 2000, and SQL Server 2005) the class monitors a specific SQL Server database table. 当表更改时，将从中移除与该表关联的项 ，并将该项的新版本添加到中 。When the table changes, items associated with the table are removed from the , and a new version of the item is added to the . 使用数据库时，类还支持与 类的集成 [!INCLUDE[sqprsqlong](~/includes/sqprsqlong-md.md)] 。The class also supports integration with the class when using a [!INCLUDE[sqprsqlong](~/includes/sqprsqlong-md.md)] database. 的查询通知机制将 [!INCLUDE[sqprsqlong](~/includes/sqprsqlong-md.md)] 检测对数据的更改，这些更改会使 sql 查询的结果失效，并从中删除与 sql 查询关联的任何缓存项 。The query notification mechanism of [!INCLUDE[sqprsqlong](~/includes/sqprsqlong-md.md)] detects changes to data that invalidate the results of an SQL query and removes any cached items associated with the SQL query from the . 使用时，可以使用 类将项添加到应用程序 中，这些项依赖于 SQL Server 数据库表或 SQL 查询 [!INCLUDE[sqprsqlong](~/includes/sqprsqlong-md.md)] 。You can use the class to add items to your application's that are dependent on either a SQL Server database table or on an SQL query when using [!INCLUDE[sqprsqlong](~/includes/sqprsqlong-md.md)]. 你还可以将此类与指令一起使用，以使输出缓存页或依赖于 SQL Server 数据库表的用户控件。You can also use this class with the directive to make an output-cached page or a user control dependent on a SQL Server database table. 最后，可以将 类与 page 指令一起使用，使输出缓存的页依赖于在使用时的 SQL 查询的结果 [!INCLUDE[sqprsqlong](~/includes/sqprsqlong-md.md)] 。Finally, you can use the class with the page directive to make an output-cached page dependent on the results of an SQL query when using [!INCLUDE[sqprsqlong](~/includes/sqprsqlong-md.md)]. [!INCLUDE[sqprsqlong](~/includes/sqprsqlong-md.md)]对于用户控件的指令，不支持使用查询通知。Query notification using [!INCLUDE[sqprsqlong](~/includes/sqprsqlong-md.md)] is not supported on the directive for user controls. > [!NOTE] > 要使此类在使用基于表的通知时正常工作，必须为要依赖于的数据库和任何表启用通知。For this class to work correctly when using table-based notifications, the database and any tables that you want to make dependencies on must have notifications enabled. 可以通过调用类的方法 或使用命令行工具来启用通知。You can enable notifications by calling methods of the class or by using the command-line tool. 此外，应用程序的 Web.config 文件中必须包含正确的配置设置。In addition, the proper configuration settings must be included in the application's Web.config file. > > 在 [!INCLUDE[sqprsqlong](~/includes/sqprsqlong-md.md)] 查询通知中使用对象不需要任何显式配置。Using a object with [!INCLUDE[sqprsqlong](~/includes/sqprsqlong-md.md)] query notification does not require any explicit configuration. 有关 [!INCLUDE[sqprsqlong](~/includes/sqprsqlong-md.md)] 使用查询通知时允许的 transact-sql 查询类型的限制的信息，请参阅联机丛书。Consult the [!INCLUDE[sqprsqlong](~/includes/sqprsqlong-md.md)] Books Online for information about restrictions on the types of Transact-SQL queries that are allowed when using query notification. 下面的示例演示了一个 ASP.NET Web.config 文件，该文件对 SQL Server 数据库表启用了基于表的依赖项。The following example shows an ASP.NET Web.config file that enables table-based dependencies on a SQL Server database table. ``` ``` ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用 和 控件来显示数据库表。The following code example uses the and controls to display a database table. 加载页面时，页面将尝试创建 对象。When the page is loaded, the page attempts to create a object. 创建对象后，页面会将项添加到中， `Cache` 并对对象具有依赖关系 。After the object is created, the page adds an item to the `Cache` with a dependency on the object. 应使用类似于此处所示的异常处理。You should use exception handling similar to that shown here. [!code-aspx-csharp[CachingSamples_SqlCacheDependency#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CachingSamples_SqlCacheDependency/CS/sqlcachedepsamplecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CachingSamples_SqlCacheDependency#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CachingSamples_SqlCacheDependency/VB/sqlcachedepsamplevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例，并使用提供的 创建缓存键依赖项。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, using the supplied to create a cache-key dependency.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数用于创建 使用产品的查询通知功能的对象 [!INCLUDE[sqprsqlong](~/includes/sqprsqlong-md.md)] 。This constructor is used to create objects that use the query-notification feature of [!INCLUDE[sqprsqlong](~/includes/sqprsqlong-md.md)] products. 与参数相关联的 SQL 语句 `sqlCmd` 必须包括以下各项：SQL statements that are associated with the `sqlCmd` parameter must include the following: - 完全限定的表名称，包括表所有者的名称。Fully qualified table names, including the name of the table owner. 例如，若要引用数据库所有者拥有的名为 Customers 的表，则 SQL 语句必须引用 `dbo.customers` 。For example, to refer to a table named Customers that is owned by the database owner, the SQL statement must refer to `dbo.customers`. - Select 语句中的显式列名称。Explicit column names in the Select statement. 不能使用星号 ( \* ) 通配符从表中选择所有列。You cannot use the asterisk (\*) wildcard character to select all columns from a table. 例如， `select * from dbo.customers` 必须使用，而不是 `select name, address, city, state from dbo.customers` 。For example, instead of `select * from dbo.customers`, you must use `select name, address, city, state from dbo.customers`. 此构造函数不能用于将 实例与 页面上的实例关联，将 [!INCLUDE[sqprsqlong](~/includes/sqprsqlong-md.md)] 查询通知与页面级输出缓存一起使用。This constructor cannot be used to associate a instance with a instance on a page using [!INCLUDE[sqprsqlong](~/includes/sqprsqlong-md.md)] query notifications with page-level output caching.

span.span: The parameter is .

exception.span: 实例的 属性设置为 ，且页上存在 特性设置为 CommandNotification 的指令。

span.span: The instance has its property set to and there is an directive on the page with the attribute set to CommandNotification.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例，并使用提供的参数创建缓存键依赖项。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, using the supplied parameters to create a cache-key dependency.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数用于创建 SQL Server 7.0 和 SQL Server 2000 产品的对象。This constructor is used to create objects for SQL Server 7.0 and SQL Server 2000 products. 传递给参数的数据库名称 `database` 必须在应用程序的 Web.config 文件中定义。The database name passed to the `database` parameter must be defined in the application's Web.config file. 例如，下面的 Web.config 文件为更改通知定义了一个名为 pubs 的数据库 。For example, the following Web.config file defines a database named pubs for change notifications. ``` ``` 使用此构造函数时，通常会引发两个异常： 和 。Two exceptions are commonly thrown when this constructor is used: and . 如果 引发了，则可以 在异常处理代码中调用该方法，或使用命令行工具为通知设置数据库。If a is thrown, you can call the method in exception-handling code, or use the command-line tool to set up the database for notifications. 如果 引发了，则可以调用方法， 或使用来设置表中的通知。If a is thrown, you can call the method or use to set up the table for notifications. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用此构造函数创建 类的实例，该类与名为 Northwind 的 SQL Server 数据库中名为 "类别" 的数据库表相关联。The following code example uses this constructor to create an instance of the class that is associated with a database table named Categories in a SQL Server database named Northwind. [!code-csharp[CachingSamples_SqlCacheDependency#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CachingSamples_SqlCacheDependency/CS/sqlcachedepsamplecs.aspx#2)] [!code-vb[CachingSamples_SqlCacheDependency#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CachingSamples_SqlCacheDependency/VB/sqlcachedepsamplevb.aspx#2)]

Public Shared Function CreateOutputCacheDependency (dependency As String) As CacheDependency

span.span: The output-cache dependency directive.

summary.span: 创建 ASP.NET 应用程序的 对象中存储的项与 SQL Server 数据库表之间的依赖关系。

span.span: Creates a dependency relationship between an item that is stored in an ASP.NET application's object and a SQL Server database table.
The new dependency object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下面的标记显示了典型的输出缓存依赖项指令。The following markup shows a typical output-cache dependency directive. ``` <%@ OutputCache Duration="3600" SqlDependency="Northwind:Employees" VaryByParam="none" %> ```

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void DependencyDispose() cil managed
.method public hidebysig virtual instance string GetUniqueID() cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetUniqueID () As String

summary.span: 检索 对象的唯一标识符。

span.span: Retrieves a unique identifier for a object.

returns.span: 如果有，则为 对象的唯一标识符；如果无法生成任何标识符，则为 Null。

span.span: The unique identifier for the object, or null if no identifier can be generated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法返回一个标识符，该标识符用于唯一跟踪 与项或应用程序关联的对象。The method returns an identifier used to uniquely track objects associated with an item or application. 使用基于表的通知时生成的唯一标识符部分依赖于数据库生成的更改标识符。The unique identifier generated when using table-based notifications is partially dependent on the change identifier generated by the database. 使用基于 SQL Server 2005 的查询通知时，唯一标识符是 `null` 因为 [!INCLUDE[sqprsqlong](~/includes/sqprsqlong-md.md)] 不支持返回单个查询通知的唯一标识符。When using SQL Server 2005-based query notifications, the unique identifier is `null` because [!INCLUDE[sqprsqlong](~/includes/sqprsqlong-md.md)] does not support returning unique identifiers for individual query notifications .
